name: Escape (itch) (Jax Hax)
description: Your goal: Simple. Escape before the timer runs out. (And without getting killed, of course). This platformer allows you to rewind time, but a few things don't get reset. I'll let you figure those out. I am sorry there is only one level, I didn't start level design until the last second, but I hope you will still enjoy it! All feedback is welcome, but try not to be too harsh, as this is my second game I've made on my own.
